Maksuttomilla välineillä pystyy tehostamaan toimintaa, ja pienin kustannuksin on mahdollista saada vielä lisää apua varsinkin toistuvien tehtävien hoitamiseen. Tule kuulemaan tietoisku tekoälystä sekä kokemuksia sen käytöstä! Tekoälystä kertoo Esko Uotila ja kokemuksia kuullaan toimijoilta eri puolilta Suomea.

title:
Call for Participants: “To AI or not to AI - the Role of GenAI in the
Context of Digital Investigations” | Online training 11-13 February 2026 |
Deadline to apply: 19 January 2026
content:
Are you unsure if, when, and how to use AI in your work? Are you
trying to identify what standards, challenges, and risks you need to consider?
Join us on 11-13 February 2026, for three half-days of training on “To AI or
not to AI - the Role of Generative AI in the Context of Digital
Investigations”. This is an online event focused on skills and methods for
navigating GenAI in media organisations, collaborative projects, and digital
investigations.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Annual Report 2024
content:
In 2024, Tactical Tech responded to a rapidly evolving digital
landscape and its accelerating socio-political and environmental impacts,
driven largely by the widespread adoption of AI technologies. With a
forward-looking, creative, and collaborative approach, we empowered civil
society, communities, and organizations to better understand and address the
growing influence of digital technologies on democracy, society, and everyday
life.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Digitized Divides
content:
Examining just a few of the threads in recent technological
developments reveals a tapestry of interwoven troubles. Tools like artificial
intelligence systematize pre-existing struggles in society and on the planet.
In this multi-part series, you’ll find out what’s really beneath the shiny
surface of technology.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
10 Key Discussions from the Digital Influence and Climate Friction
Gathering 2024
content: From December 2–4, 2024, Tactical Tech’s Influence Industry Project brought together  35 researchers, artists, journalists, community organizers, and communications professionals from 14 countries at Publix House of Journalism in Berlin for the inaugural Digital Influence and Climate Friction Gathering.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Hello AI
content:
AI enhances efficiency and decision-making but also exacerbates
social inequalities, reinforces biases, and threatens democracy. In our latest
article, Executive Director Marek Tuszynski explores the urgent need to
question who controls AI and why we need regulations that ensure transparency,
accountability, and fairness while prioritizing human rights and sustainable
resource use.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

content:
Our partners Casa Criatura are a creative hub in Brazil that
transforms school spaces into vibrant learning environments. Through
interactive exhibitions and collaborations with Tactical Tech, they engage
young people in critical discussions on technology, privacy, and digital
security.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Caceroliando: Promoting creative Storytelling for Change among activists
shaping Colombia's peacebuilding Process
content:
Our partner, Caceroliando plays a crucial role in empowering
communities through creative storytelling, contributing significantly to
Colombia’s peacebuilding efforts. This article highlights their collaboration
with Tactical Tech’s Exposing the Invisible project, showcasing how they equip
activists with media skills to document social justice and reconciliation.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: The Persistent Problems Of Digital Resilience
content:
In this article, I'll share some of the key lessons we've learned
about navigating the complex world of digital security. I'll look at how to
identify the right tools, services, resources, and organisations to protect
your community, network, or organisation from cyber threats - and why this
work is more important than ever.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Supercharged by AI: A new creative intervention about the effects of AI
on our online lives
content:
From chatbots to deepfakes, AI-generated content is becoming
increasingly common online. New AI tools make it easier, faster and cheaper to
generate text, images, videos, and more. In turn, the harms that have always
existed online – scams, harassment, polarisation and bias – are now being
“supercharged” by AI.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: The quest to understand influencing machines
content:
We need to rethink how we deal with information in the context of
crises. All of us, really. We, the digital users of the digitised information
world, need to get a grip on things. How we explore the world, what and who we
trust, and why, in the context of crises, has gotten too far out of our hands
and needs to change. We need a place to come together. We need to reinvent how
we talk about and solve difficult things while respecting any fundamental
differences we might come to the table or scre...
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Unpacking Artificial Intelligence with the Data Detox Kit: What everyone
needs to know about AI and its impacts
content:
This new package of engaging and easy-to-read Data Detox Kit guides
delves into AI and explores how its buzz can have a big sting. By using
real-world examples, familiar and non-technical language, these AI guides are
filled with actionable steps that anyone can take to gain awareness of modern
technologies and take control where possible.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: The Tech Ouroboros: About the digitised culture of consumption
content:
We are in the business of developing tools that allow us to eat our
own tail, and AI is the new big mouth that we have just invented to help us
with this self-consuming task incredibly effectively. In this spiral of
self-consumption, everything tastes the same - it is impossible to verify
sources and provenance and impossible to separate disgusting opinions from
facts. It seems that fiction is much more popular than non-fiction in this
reading club of self-consumers.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Annual Report 2023
content:
In 2023, Tactical Tech celebrated 20 years of innovative and
collaborative work dedicated to building the capacity of communities around
the world to face the challenges brought by new technologies. Over these two
decades—together with our partners, collaborators, funders, and supporters—we
reached over 30 million people in more than 90 countries, engaging them in
conversations to increase their understanding and agency while navigating the
digital landscape.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
[Interview] Our Executive Director Marek Tuszynski talks with Mozilla
about Tactical Tech's thought-provoking experiences and work
content: Our Executive Director and co-founder, Marek Tuszynski, who was one of the winners of Mozilla's Rise 25 Awards in 2023, talked with Mozilla's team about his inspiration, Tactical Tech's work and the future challenges we face online.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Everywhere, All the Time: A digital literacy intervention for teens that
fosters critical conversions about technology and AI
content:
”Everywhere, All the Time” is a creative and playful digital
literacy intervention designed for teens. Educators can use it to promote
critical conversations about technology, AI, and their impacts.

title:

title: SHARE? - A Thought-Provoking Sci-Fi Film by Ira Rosensweig
content:
Ira Rosensweig's new film explores the complex human relationship
with technology, with a particular focus on the profound impact of social
media on both individuals and society.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Yusuf Ganyana: empowering young people to be agents of digital
transformations in Kenya
content:
Our partner Yusuf, IT professional and digital literacy expert,
aims to raise awareness among Kenyan youth about technology's transformative
power and digital rights by encouraging young people to take control of their
online presence, protect their privacy, and make informed digital choices.
Read more about his work.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
TEDIC: leading the conversations for Paraguay's new personal data
protection law
content: Our partners from TEDIC are actively involved in the defense and promotion of human rights in digital environments in Paraguay with a focus on gender inequalities and their intersections. Read more to learn about their mission to reshape the national landscape of data protection legislation.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Roehana Project: strengthening digital literacy of human rights
defenders in Indonesia

organization, conducted training sessions for 20 human rights defenders from
11 NGOs in Indonesia. Learn more about their work on democracy, human rights,
gender, culture, and environment.

title: There Is Plastic In The Clouds
content:
Understanding the real scale and scope and consequences of the
environmental crisis depends on how digital technology influences our thinking
about it in terms of scale and depth and short and long term consequences, as
well as what solutions we can imagine to create and deploy against all this
chaos. Text by Marek Tuszynski
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
An Assessment of the Needs of Educators and Youth in Europe for a Digital
and Media Literacy Education Intervention
content: Using an interdisciplinary approach that combines educator scoping sessions, research, literature review and youth input sessions, Tactical Tech identified insights and recommendations about topics, formats and facilitation methodologies crucial to creating effective Digital and Media Literacy Educational resources.

title: We are turning 20
content:
Twenty years ago, Tactical Tech was formed with the goal of
enabling communities around the world to face the challenges and changes
brought by new digital technologies. This year, we celebrate two decades of
innovation and co-creation with our partners, collaborators and funders.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Annual Report 2022
content:
In 2022, Tactical Tech partnered with over 150 trusted local actors
from more than 60 countries to inform and engage their communities in
conversations around the relationship between technology, democracy and crises
and to provide them with the necessary tools and information to enable them to
take action and make informed decisions. Discover the results and impact of
our collaborative work in 2022.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Adventures in Mapping Digital Empires
content:
For years, Tactical Tech has worked to understand and visualise Big
Tech's impact on society. In this piece, you will be taken on a journey
through the different formats, narratives and visual representations Tactical
Tech has used to tell the story behind the acquisitions, mergers and
investments of the Big Tech Google, Amazon, Facebook, Apple and Microsoft.
Read to learn about our provocation design approach to promote digital
thinking.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Our digital and media literacy resources for youth are now available in
15 languages
content:
Our What The Future Wants exhibition and digital and media literacy
resources for young people are now available in 15 different languages. To
date, the What the Future Wants events have engaged more than 11.500
participants in 30  countries.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
Cycles of Control: Private Companies and the Surveillance of
Reproductive Health
content:
Data about reproduction, and especially menstruation, is being
tracked and gathered by many different companies, without people’s awareness
of the extent or the financial value this data has, nor the possible
consequences for them individually or the collective harm.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: The GAFAM Empire project
content:

Tactical Tech that looks at all the known acquisitions conducted by five big
tech companies: Google, Amazon, Facebook, Apple, and Microsoft, from the
moment they made their first one to the end of summer of 2022, when we stopped
collecting data.

title:
Co-Creation as Methodology for Uncertain Times: Practice, Learnings, and
Findings
content:
In this mini-series, we explore how Tactical Tech’s first
youth-centered team co-created the public education intervention What the
Future Wants, which was released in Spring 2022. Here we dive into the
workshops we conducted and share principles and practices that informed the
co-creation process and findings from the workshops.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title: Co-Creating a Public Education Intervention: A Contextual Analysis
content:
This series outlines the initiation, delivery, and findings of the
What the Future Wants project (so far) in the hope that other organisations,
initiatives, and individuals working with young people can learn from our
experience and the rich insights of all of the young people who contributed.

content: The Digital You initiative is a collaboration between Goethe-Institut Kinshasa and Tactical Tech, that invites young people in Sub-Saharan African countries to think critically about their relationship with digital technologies and how tech influences their lives.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
The Influence Industry Explorer: A new online tool to explore 500
companies enabling political influence worldwide
content: Tactical Tech launches “The Influence Industry Explorer”, an online investigation tool that comprises evidence on 500 companies that work with political groups in over 30 countries to influence voters’ opinions.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

title:
New Report: Digital Reset. Redirecting Technologies for the Deep
Sustainability Transformation.
content:
The “Digital Reset” report by the project ‘Digitalization for
Sustainability – Science in Dialogue’ (D4S) shows how digital technologies can
support the quest for such a deep sustainability transformation. The report
provides a blueprint for the European Union to reconceptualise digitalisation
so that it first and foremost contributes to achieving carbon neutrality,
resource autonomy and economic resilience while supporting equity and fully
respecting citizens’ rights and privacy.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

Tactical Tech is looking for engaged, outgoing exhibition hosts to
assist in an outdoor, public exhibition about technology and crisis entitled
“Everything Will Be Fine.” The exhibition takes place in a temp
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

content:
We are looking for an engaged Grants and Fundraising Coordinator

sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.

content:

collectives in Southwest Asia and North Africa (SWANA) to collaborate with the
worldwide-renowned Data Detox Kit.
sourceDescription: Tactical Tech is an international NGO that engages with citizens and civil-society organisations to explore and mitigate the impacts of technology on society.
